title: Ninaivugal Thane Lyrics Kandaen Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Devan Ekambaram
Song : Ninaivugal
Movie :Kandaen
Lyrics: Thamarai
Music Director :- Vijay Ebenezer


Ninaivugal thane, Ninaivugal thane
Ennai Vazhthuthe, ennai vizhthuthe
sugamaaki sudukirathe


Ninaivugal thane un Ninaivugal thane
En nenjil endrendrum thavalkirathe
Ninaivugal thane un Ninaivugal thane
Ennai Vazhthuthe, ennai vizhthuthe
sugamaaki sudukirathe
Ninaivugal thane un Ninaivugal thane
En nenjil endrendrum thavalkirathe


Un punnagayil uyir sangamam
Adhu eppadi aanadhu
un Kanmaaniye nan kasaindhu povadhenge
Nee endhan vanavil, nan endha moolayil
Unnai thedi thedi enuyir kasangiyathe...


Ninaivugal thane, Ninaivugal thane
Ennai Vazhthuthe, ennai vizhthuthe
sugamaaki sudukirathe


Ninaivugal thane un Ninaivugal thane
En nenjil endrendrum thavalkirathe
